E aprop considera si la generacio de ydropici es de part dels budels, quar lahoras cove que tu am la seccio te alonhes del ombelic per la quantitat de tres ditz a las partidas dejos, en le dreyt de lu sobre le pentenilh.	And then consider if the generation of dropsy is from the part of the intestines, for it is known that you should make a section of the navel with three fingers' width to the affected parts below, on the right side of the intestine.
Mays si la generacio de hydropici es per malautia del fietge, lahoras la tua seccio sia sinistra del ombilic per tres ditz.	If the generation of dropsy is from disease of the liver, then your section should be on the left of the navel for three fingers.
E si la generacio de lu es per la melsa, lahoras la tua seccio sia en le las dreyt.	And if the generation of it is from the bladder, then your section should be on the right side.
E no cove que la tua seccio sia sobre le costat sobre le qual vol jaser le malaute per que no corron las superfluitatz ad aquel loc freul.	And it is not suitable that your section be on the rib, on which the disease wants to be, so that the excesses do not run to that place freely.
E aprop perfora am le instrument tota la codena, e aprop entromet en aquela seccio, e eleva la tua ma am le spatum entre la codena e·l siphac, e tu excorja aquel; e si’ la quantitat de una ungla o enviro.	And then perforate the entire code with the instrument, and introduce it into that section, and elevate your hand with the spatula between the code and the siphac, and you will extract that; and if the quantity of an nail or environment.
E aprop perforo le ciphac entro que pervengua le spatum al loc vuoyt, e es loc de l’aygua.	And then perforate the siphac so that the spatula reaches the empty place, and it is the place of the water.
E aprop extratz aquel e entromet un instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	And then extract that and introduce an instrument of which this is the shape:
e es semblant a canula de argent subtil; es fayt de argent o de eram o de lato leon, al qual en la partida pus bassa de lu es un petit trauc, e en les costatz de lu so tres traucs: dos de una partida e un del autra partida; e fayta es la extremitat de lu insciza segon la manieyra de pluma, ayssi cum vezes:	and it is similar to a subtle silver cannula; it is made of silver or copper or gold alloy, in which at the lower part of it there is a small hole, and on the sides of it there are three holes: two on one side and one on the other side; and the extremity of it is engraved according to the manner of a feather pen, thus as follows:
E en la extramitat de lu pus sobirana es armilla, quar quan le instrument perve al aygua, lahoras aquela tantost deysen sobre le instrument, donc evacua de l’aygua en la ora miega quantitat, quar si tu evacuas de aquela mes que no cove en la hora, fort leu mor le malaute per resolucio del sieu spirit animal, o accideys a lu cincopi que es appropinquada la mort.	And at the uppermost extremity of it there is a little arm, because when the instrument penetrates the water, then that water rises above the instrument, thus evacuating from the water in the middle a certain quantity, because if you evacuate from it more than it can hold in the hour, the patient will likely die from the resolution of their animal spirit, or approaches death with the quintessence which is approaching.
Mays evacua de aquela segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu e segon que significan a tu las disposicios del malaute de la vertut del pols de lu e de la bontat de lu.	Empty evacuation of that seat according to the quantity of the virtue of it and according to what the disposition of the patient indicates of the virtue of the pulse of it and of the goodness of it.
E aprop extrats le instrument, e rete l’aygua la qual causa es quar tantost es retenguda per la codena la qual rete le trauc que es sobre le ciphac del qual e recomtat a tu que perfores aquel segon aquela manieyra.	And then extract the instrument, and hold back the water which causes it to be retained by the bowel, which holds the pipe that is above the navel, of which it is recommended to you that you perforate in that manner that way.
E aprop itera le instrument al autra dia si vezes le malaute tollerant aquo, e extratz de la aygua petita quantitat, e fay aquo per alcus jorns sobre temor, e guarda te de error entro que no romangua de l’aygua sino pauc.	And then insert the instrument to the other side if the patient tolerates it, and extract a small quantity of water, and do so for several days on account of fear, and guard yourself from error while not breaking more of the water except a little.
Mays si tu temes sobre le malaute, e leyssas de l’aygua gran quantitat, lahoras cura aquel am sepultura en arena cauda, e mota suzor en banh, e al solelh espere per lonc temps; e cura aquel am medicinas dessicativas entro que sia sanat.	When you fear for the patient, and a large quantity of water is drained, then treat that member with burial in hot sand, and immersion in bath, and expose to the sun for a long time; and treat that member with desiccative medicines until it is healed.
E cauteriza sobre le stomac, e la melsa e·l fitge aprop la extraccio de l’aygua, segon que yeu he recontat en aquo que es precedit.	And cauterize the stomach, and the middle and the liver after the extraction of water, as it has been recounted to you in what precedes.
Capitol .lv.	Chapter twelve or Chapter 12
De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	On the treatment of children whose places of urine are not perforated.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	Some newborns are born with a hole in the stomach of their mother and the head of their mixture is not perforated (or it is strictly closed or it is not in its place).
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	Therefore, we must make an opening in it as soon as it is born with a subtle spatula according to this method:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	And then stop up the hole with a small lead nail and tie it, and keep it for three days or for four.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	And when it wants to urinate let it be uncovered and urinate; and then cover it again.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	And if you do not stop up the lead, it is possible that the urine which passes over the place will not close this.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	It is better for that which has a strict hole to be treated with a lead nail, as we have said, for many days until it is enlarged.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	Better are those in which the hole is not in its place, it is said, the cause of which is that some are born with the hole of the penis at the end of the head of the virility so that they cannot urinate in the divided parts inside, until they lift the virility to their mother in the divided parts above; and it is not a generation, because the sperm cannot reach the mother according to rectitude, and it is a very bad illness.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	And the manner of the operation on them is that the patient should be placed on their back, and then extend the head of the penis with your left hand with vigorous extraction, and insert the point of the instrument at the place of the perineum with a sharp pointed tool, like one would insert a feather, or so that you do not touch any other part, so that the middle of the vein appears similar to the head of the penis and that which is drawn falls in the middle place according to need.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And beware that in your operation of blood flow, many things can go wrong; and be careful with them that you are cutting the blood vessels, and treat the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lvi.	Chapter 6.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	About the removal of what is done on the prepuce at the head of the penis and of corrosion and blackness and adherence of the prepuce to the head of the penis.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Many times this removal is done on the penis and it is an excess of flesh.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one of them is malignant and the other is non-malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	Non-malignant, it is fitting that you suspend with a subtle hook and cut that one until it is completely removed; and then apply a poultice of submirgit, an Egyptian ointment; and then, treat the wound with a diafinicon ointment until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	If the ulcer is malignant, with a bad color, then it is advisable that you apply cautery near the edge of it and the root of it.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	Moreover if the ulcer is on the prepuce of the head of the uncircumcised penis, and one part of the ulcer is within the prepuce and the other part is outside, then it is advisable that you show the ulcer which is inside at the beginning until it is consolidated; and then you cure the outer one, for when you cure both at the same time, it is not certain that it will not be injured.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	And also accidents happen in the genitals and in the prepuce with blackness and corruption, therefore it is advisable that you remove all that which is already degenerated and that which wants to corrupt or is already corrupted; and apply a liniment on that area with honey, which is mixed with flour of wheat and of dried and crushed roots.
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And treat the one with the other cure until it is healthy.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	But if there is an efflux of blood, then administer lunar cautery in this manner:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	For juvenile cautery is of two dispositions at the same time, one is for an efflux of blood and the other is for the wound when it is corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corroded and destroyed entirely at that time, then it is necessary that you insert into the middle of the foreskin a lead tube so that the patient urinates through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the adherence of the foreskin to the head of the penis (and this adherence only occurs in one whose foreskin is its own, and for whom circumcision has not been performed; and when adherence occurs due to a wound or an abscess) it is necessary that you scrape with a blunt spatula until the ligament is dissolved and the head of the penis is freed from all adhesion.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	And if it is difficult to distinguish those things precisely, then it is necessary that you scrape with a spatula some part of the head of the penis and of the foreskin, and thus it is because the foreskin, when it is subtle, is perforated by its subtlety gently.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	Then separate the foreskin from the head of the penis with a gentle touch, which has previously been soaked in cold water so that they do not adhere again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then let it be treated with a stringent ointment until it is consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter 48.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	Of the cleansing of infants and the treatment of that which occurs to those who are circumcised.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not a solution for continuity issues: but rather it's up to our operation and will, and the results of that are especially in children, it is necessary that we assign the best operation and way so that they lose less health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Thus I say that the ancients did not call circumcision in any of their free writings, because they didn't use it in their laws, and it's not so because we have acquired through experimentation, which is the reason why most artisans and barbers have been found using circumcision and purification with a new knife and tongs; and they use ligatures with thread and incisions with the nail.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have already forbidden all these methods and do not find better purification with forceps, or ligatures with thread, than the purification with the nail, because many times it happens that the skin tears from below, since the skin of the foreskin has two layers, and one layer is left above, and this is where the tear is, which leads to another incision and secure pain.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And in the purification that is done by the apothecary, and is digital, which the surgeons use, the incision of the extremity of the virile member is not secure, because the thread enters into its channel.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	More damage in the operation with the nail, for the iron tool corrupts and mars the entire operation.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the child's bowel is short by nature, and many times seen in such a manner that there is no need for modification, and I have seen it before.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	More of the modification that is done with forces and ligaments of the thigh, goodness, experiment has shown to me, where the forces are of proportional incision, because the acuity that is above is just like the acuity that is below; and thus when you press your hand proportionally on both acuities, and make an incision according to a comparison in one time; and it is made compression of the thigh with a figure containing the bowel of the entire partition, with which no error is made.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	And the manner of the first operation is that you should make the child stay still if it is one of those who understand a little, that you not do anything but place the thigh on its own partition, only so much, and that you lift it up into the other day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	Then do this to cheer up in all that manner which is at your possibility, according to what receives its intelligence.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then be with your hands prepared in a steady position, and do not make any movement; and hide the forces in your hand or below the thigh, so that the child does not see them nor any other of the instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Then insert your hand into the patient's vagina and blow into the womb, and pull out that which is inside until the head of the fetus is visible, and then cleanse that which has accumulated in it due to the retention of filth.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Then tie the tied area with a double thread, and tie below that one a small second ligature, and you put your fingers on the said pus and hold the area of the ligature well, and insert between two ligatures.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then lift the womb upwards and extract the head of the fetus; and gently press out the blood little by little, for it is better; and sprinkle powder above and on the powder place a cloth in which has been sprinkled mucus of houndog or owl, mixed with oil of rose, recently beaten; and apply that on the wound until the next day; and treat that with treatment until it is healed.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the ulcers for cleansing, this is the shape:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	Let some of them be uncut and the others cut, so that the branch of the nail is not visible, and let the length of the two edges be equal to the length of two joined finger joints.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	The greatest mistake in cleansing is when the inner womb expels all of its contents, or part of it, due to inadequate incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore it is necessary that you extend your finger during your hour on the edge of the abscess, and that you cut it according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your finger, then extract it with a hook and cut it.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if three days have passed, and the matter that is inflamed under the infected wound has not been discharged, then let it be that the discharge of the apostemation is facilitated, and cut away the feculent part with ease, and incise according to what you have prepared.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And beware of the head of the wound, lest it becomes putrid.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	Therefore treat it with the remedy that the wound consolidates from the powders which we have recommended in the treatise of powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it is incised on the flank beyond measure, and the divided parts are opened, this will not be noticed by him.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	And thus treat it with what we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lviii.	Chapter 53.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	Of the treatment of urine retained in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Retention of urine in the bladder is caused by obstruction made by stone or congealed blood, or by a mass or tumor, and similar to those things that we have said regarding the methods of treatment in the division.
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolved, and there is retention of it in the bladder because of a stone that is already in the neck of the bladder, then it is necessary that the patient be seated on two chairs.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	And then place the feet of that one on the back of two chairs and stretch out the belly of the affected part above the back of the two chairs, and the patient should tighten their grip as much as is possible to them.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then the neck of the bladder is constricted, it expels the stone to the back parts, so that the urine is absorbed.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if it is not dissolved with the water that we have mentioned, the cause is violently made on the patient, then it is necessary that you administer extraction of it with an instrument that is called a syringe, of which this is the form: It should be of silver and the needle should be subtle, like a small cane or reed, as thin as a feather's quill, in similarity to a palm and a half, to which there is a subtle hole at the top.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	And the handling of the emission of urine with this is that you take the thread doubled and tie it at the extremity of the wool or cotton for good ligature; and introduce the extremities of the thread into the part of the syringe, and cut with scissors if there is any superfluous cause of the wool, but introduce it into the cane with violence. And then insert the syringe with force and with album of urine.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Make the patient lie on their side, and wrap the bladder of theirs and the rod with olive oil and vinegar.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	And then insert the needle with ease until it reaches the root of the rod; and then bend the rod downwards towards the navel; and then press the needle inwards there; and then press it inwards until it reaches the bladder, and this sign that the patient is being affected by the cause they are suffering from, and it is not done according to this order, but rather as the illness demands, where it goes awry.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then stretch the vein on the wool little by little, so that the urine wets the wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract that and do for the cure of urine, and use a needle, do not stop doing this and use a needle until the bladder is evacuated and the patient finds relief.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter 49.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	Of the quality of injection into the bladder with a clamp and similar instruments which are suited for that purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there is an ulcer or abscess in the bladder, or congealed blood in it, or it is obstructed by sediment, and you want to distill waters and medicines into it, then do so with an instrument which is called a clamp, and this is its form:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	But in the extremity of it, it is numb, so it is closed.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in that one there are three holes: two from one side, and thus many times.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	In the beginning it is a concave place, in which there is what is swallowed, and it is according to the quantity that oppresses it, until when some cause is drawn from the humidity, it is drawn, and when it is expelled, with it being drawn, and when it expels long, according as it makes clamp or clamp-like, as that which is made in the naval battles of the sea.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	Therefore when you want to project humidity into the bladder, insert the extremity of the clamp into the humidity, and draw with it the water that is absorbed by the lower parts, because the humidity is drawn into the cavity of the clamp.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	And then insert the extremity of the clamp into the rod according to what we have recommended in the circle; and then absorb the humidity with the water that you absorb, because that humidity reaches the bladder immediately, and the patient feels it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	Shape of the subtle bladder in which the bladder is shaped, and this is the shape:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	And let it be made of silver or of gold, of which the head is similar to a small feather, and place the tube gently inside.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	And then take the bladder by hand, and pause to remove the humidity that you want to crystallize in the bladder, and tie it between two strong ligatures with a double thread, and evaporate that humidity over the fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	And then insert the extremity of the catheter into the penis.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	And then tighten your hand over the bladder with the humidity and strictured descent, so that the patient feels that the humidity has already penetrated to the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	If the bladder is not present to you, then take a piece of sponge and make a circle from it; and perforate that with all its roughness; and then insert a strong thread into those channels, so that they are well wrapped; and then attach the circle as it has been attached to the navel, because you pause in that water that you want to drain, along with humors and liquids.
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then tie that to the instrument and do it in the same way as you have done on the bladder, and express with your hand that the humidity penetrates to the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the extraction of stone.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already spoken in the division of the species of stone and its cure with medicines, and the difference between stone generated in the kidneys and stone generated in the bladder, and its symptoms.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have said that the stone on which every operation is performed with the hand, is cut.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	The stone formed in the bladder itself is the one that is fixed in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I will now explain it with clear exposition and briefness.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Therefore I say that the stone formed in the bladder mostly goes to the children; and of its signs it is that the urine which is expelled from the bladder is similar to water in its subtlety, and appears as sand; and the patient rubs their groin, and many times it seems painful, and then it is treated; and with this the hole is made in many of those.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And the cure for the children of that age who have reached 14 years is easy; and it is a difficult treatment in the old.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	But in the young it is moderate because it is between the two.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And concerning that one for whom the stone is larger and the treatment is easier; And if it is small, it is contrary to that.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Therefore when we come to the treatment of this, it is necessary at the beginning of this that we cleanse the patient with a purgative which removes all the wound which is in their intestine; because this wound many times prohibits the evacuation of the stone by obstructing it.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	And then press the patient's feet with your hands and hold them firm above so that the stone descends to the bottom of the bladder, or it will jump out of place at some other visible spots.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then make that circle prepared between your hands, and the patient's hands will be placed on their hips, so that the entire bladder is made to decline towards the parts below.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then ask for a vessel and prepare everything for a bowel movement.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Then if you feel the stone in the space, then you will be satisfied as soon as it is dried on the patient.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if the patient does not touch everything with their right hand, then it is necessary that you anoint their right hand with oil on the left side of the bed, if the patient is a child, or the middle finger if they are a young adult, and insert that in their buttocks.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And ask for the stone until it comes out from the patient's right hand.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And turn that small stone little by little into the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	And then press on it with your right hand, and push that stone downwards towards the bottom of the bladder to the place where you felt it.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And command the servant to press the bladder with their hand; and command another servant to extend the knees downwards with their right hand, and with their left hand to hold back the buttocks which are below the knees, in the area where the operation is being performed.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert a spatula to explore the incident of which this is the shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	And divide in that which is between the anus and the genitals, not in the middle place, above the left thigh; and let the incision be on that part and the right hand be inside the anus, and let a transverse incision be made, so that the external incision be wide and deep according to the quantity that comes out of the part as much as is possible, and not larger, because the hand compresses the right hand which is in the anus the stone against the incision, and it is facilitated without difficulty.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that there is a part of the stone to which there are angles and margins, because of which the extraction of it is made difficult by this.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And of that stone there comes out something resembling a nut, and it is round, and its extraction is made easy.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Then if it is the one which has angles and margins, adjust it in the fissure.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not thus easily removed, then you must push on that, or grasp around that with your hand decently, the extremity of which should be like a file on which you grasp around the stone, and do not let go of it; or you insert another subtle instrument of curved extremity.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	If you cannot walk on that, then increase the hole a little, and if you see a flow of blood, apply to the strong area a cauterized vitriol.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	If the stone is more than one, then to begin with, you will push the hand into the mouth of the bladder, and then insert a knife in it; and then push a little tube into that; and similarly do if there are many stones.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if it is a very large stone, then ignorance would be to insert that with a large section, because it brings to the patient one of two causes: either death or that it prevents the continuous distillation of urine, because the area is not completely consolidated.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	Administer a purge to make it come out from the inside, or put a bandage on the fracture with the forces that extract it in presses.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Then when you have completed your operation, fill the wound with a mixture of aloe and dragon's blood, and strengthen it.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And put on that a dressing soaked in oil and wine, or in rosated oil and cold water, so that the post-wound scab may be softened.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then have the patient lie on their back, and do not undo the dressing for three days.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when the aura is unbound, moisten the area with water and warm oil, and then treat it with a gentle ointment of diafinicon and a soothing balm of diabazilicon until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	If the plague is complicated by an apostema caut, adjust and corrosive, and it seems as if the blood is congealed in the bladder, and because of this the urine is prohibited (and this is known through the egression of blood in the urine), then insert a tube into the wound and extract the blood, because remaining there it provokes corruption of the bladder and putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the wound with sharp vinegar, water and salt, and apply to it all species, with that which is convenient for its cure until it is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And take care during the entire treatment that you apply the medicines which have been paused on the area, with your hands between the thighs and adjust them.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and in the middle of the bladder, and it is stuck, and the flow of urine is prohibited, then treat it with that which has been recommended beforehand to prevent a section, because many times this treatment is accused of being too dry; and already having tried and experimented, take a iron perforator, the shape of which is:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	of triangular extracted fat, needle, made in a pipe or flute.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And then take a thread, and tie it to that verge of the thigh, near the hip, so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And then insert the iron into the verge, piercing with facility through until the piercer comes to that hip.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And rotate the piercer with your hand on that small hip, little by little, and you will make the piercing of it until you cause the other part to penetrate; for the urine is thus absorbed.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then press your hand on that which is broken of the hip of the affected part of the thigh, because it is weakened, and it is perforated with urine, and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this cure is not suited to you for some reason that prohibits it, then tie a thread behind the hip, and another thread above the hip.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then bind above the hip on that thigh between two ligatures.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then loosen the ligature and cleanse the wounded area with a poultice, which is made on the wound.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	It is not necessary to tie the thigh with a bandage, but rather so that it does not return to the bladder, and another bandage above, because when the bandage is loosened near the rectum, the colon returns to its place and the wound heals.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for this reason it is necessary to tie the thigh above, so that you elevate the colon to the separated parts above, or so that it returns and fulfills its duty, and the wound heals as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter 61.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	On the extraction of the rectum from women.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	The rectum in women is rarely affected.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	But if the rectum is affected in any of them, then the cure is difficult and it is forbidden due to too many manual interventions.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is that the woman has a strong or strained back.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you do not find a woman who is wise enough to describe to the doctor what she feels, or one of the women having been married.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you do not find a woman who knows this art, especially the operation on the hand.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the place of the incision near the rectum in women is far from the place of the rectum, because deep indications of incision are feared, and there is danger in it.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	More often if necessity provokes you to this, then it is fitting that you take a woman doctor of science, and few are more skilled.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you are deprived of that, then seek a doctor who is subtle and skilled, or present a midwife who is trained in the art of women, or a woman who has shared knowledge of this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	Therefore make that one present, and command to them that they do all that you will order, from the beginning of the inquiry to the commencement; which thing is because it regards whether the woman is a virgin, then it is fitting that one put their finger in the bottom of theirs and check the area.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Therefore if you find that, cut that with your finger, and then command to them that they inject above that.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if she is not a virgin, then command the midwife to insert her finger into the vagina of the patient and inquire about the area, after placing her left hand on the bladder, and hold it with good compression.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Therefore if you find that, then it is fitting that you gently move that from the orifice of the bladder to the lower parts towards the summit of its virtue where it comes from, to the root of the thigh.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	And then insert the needle into the fatty tissue of the thigh near the knee joint, where the flesh of any part is thickest, and place a small stone in that area, and let the patient's word not be heeded when the stone is pressed.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And let the incision be small at the beginning; and then insert the blade on that incision, and if the stone is felt, then adjust the incision according to the quantity that you know the stone will be extracted from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And know that the types of stones are many: for some of them are small and large, and rough and sharp, and long and round, and having ridges.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore you know how many types there are of it, for that which you signify about that which you want.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you see a flow of blood, apply on the spot a triturated mixture and hold it for an hour until the blood is stopped, and then return to your operation until the stone is extracted.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And make sure you have prepared for yourself the instruments which are mentioned in the extraction of stones from men, so that you may be helped by them in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you see a flow of blood, and you know that the expulsion of blood is from the artery that is cut, then apply powder on the spot and staunch it with dust and strict bandage, and do not repeat this; for leave the stone and do not extract it, because very likely the patient will die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	And then treat the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Therefore when the sharpness of the blood is calmed by certain days, and the place is purified, then you return to your operation until the stone is expelled.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	On the section about hernia with a cough.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia is not anything but an accumulation of humidity in the white bile duct which is below the diaphragm of the testicles containing the urine, and it is called bile duct.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And some times it is in the proper peritoneum which nature prepares for the urine, until it is said that there is another urine; and it is the diaphragm of the testicle between the white bile duct which we have mentioned, and it is not this but a tumor.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	And the generation of this hernia is due to weakness which affects the testicles, because in them is accumulated this matter, and sometimes it happens by a blow made on the testicles.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	And this humidity has various colors, for the color of it is either declinating to citrine or bloody, or red, or it is black and feculent, or it is white and blanch, and it is that which is most.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the signs by which it is known are this aggregation of water: for if it is in the white bile that we have spoken of, then the apostema is slightly declining in length thus as a figure of a hoop, and appears the genital area, because humidity contains that from every part.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the humidity is in its own pancreatic area, then the apostema is declining with separation of the hoop and thus one estimates that it is another hoop.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the humidity is between the coding of the genitals and the white bile, then remove the sediment.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	And when you want to know the color of the humidity, then probe the color of the humidity in the apostema with a mixture of heated material whose form is preceded; and according to what comes out in the remains of the mixture, judge what is lacking in it.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore when we come to the treatment of it with iron, then it is good that we command the patient to be bled if it is possible for them, and let them eat the liver of a beast.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	And then apply a resin over the seat, two or three on some cause a little higher, and let them drink the juice of raisins.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	And then place yourself on the left side of them, and command the assistant to follow on their right side, who should extend their arm to both sides of the hip joint and to the division of the navel of the belly.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	And then take a spatula and divide the hip joint in the middle, lengthwise, close to the perineum.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	And let the section be made according to a straight rule, at a distance from the line that separates the skin of the hips, until it reaches the white spine, including the pubic area.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	And scratch that, and observe, and be careful that you do not cut into it; and your scratching should be with the tool which is suspended from the upper arm and subtly examine the scratching according to the quantity that is possible for you.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	And then puncture the full bladder with a wide perforation, and extract all of the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And then separate between the two lips of the wound with forceps, and stretch the bladder to the upper parts; and do not touch the hip joint, and cut the bladder in that manner which is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	And cut it in its entirety or in pieces, and especially the subtle lower layer, because if you do not examine the incision of it meticulously, it is not done safely so that the water does not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	When the hollow of that defect of his crotch in the time of your operation, after you have completed the section of the perineum, return inside that, and then adjust the two lips of the crotch of the genitals with a suture, and then cure it in the same way as the other wounds, until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if you find the hollow corrupted by another disease, then it is necessary to elevate the vessels which support the suspended matter, and extract the hollow, and then cure it with the same treatment that we have said.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	When the water is collected in two separate parts, then you know that there are two hernias; thus, cut that part according to what you have done on the other side; and if it seems to you that it is a work, then you do it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And then you cleanse the wound, and insert a linen cloth submerged in oil or in rose oil; and place another clean linen cloth which you have submerged in wine and oil, and spread it over the two genitals and the navel of the belly; and cover with double cloths and powders, and tie them with a bandage which is according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	And then press two cloths and fill them with hot woolen material according to this resemblance; and make the extremities tight with cloth or wet wool, and add them to the structure in the waist of the breeches, and one of the extremities take from the buttocks between the two, and the second take at the partition of the perineum, and two extremities over two hips and two other extremities on two thighs, and all the structure be adjusted in the waist of the breeches.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And some times this hernia is medicated artificially with a cautery in place of a cut with iron; and it is that you take a sharp cautery knife and that you make incisions in the skin of the genitals, and it is ignited according to what we have recommended until it is discovered the white ciphac containing water, and then you take the cautery according to this form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is assembled in Greek letter.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And then puncture that ciphac, and it is ignited until all the humidity is driven out.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And then stretch the ciphac with tongs, and scrape it with tongs, and scrape it with a sharp ignited cautery; and make incisions according to what is possible for you until you eradicate all of it; and beware of the hole that the fire does not touch.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And it is known that this operation is more beneficial and longer in stopping the flow of blood, and better than an operation with a section.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you find an abscess or a painful swelling at the time of section or at the time of cauterization, or flow of blood, then it is advisable that you cure the condition that causes pain to him, with the treatment that is suitable for him according to what has been said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	But if the patient is faint-hearted and does not expect a second operation due to its horror, then administer a perforation as I have recommended; and it is when you are certain of this, based on what we have said about the symptoms, that this hernia is painful.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then it is advisable that you place the patient on some elevated chair, and puncture the abscess in the lowest part of him with a spatula, and make the perforation according to the length of the body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the opening be wide enough that all the water flows out.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	And then press on the place with a bandage and bind it, so that the rest of the water flows out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then treat it until the wound is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if a condition prevents the flow of water at that time, you perforate it: and this is not done except for when the white pancreatic tissue in the orifice of the wound causes a condition and prohibits the outflow of water, then it is advisable that you insert into the wound a needle or instrument with which the water of the drops is extracted, the form of which is described; or adjust on the opening of the wound a small tube.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And you know that the water returns, and it is given for six months or a year to those; and when it is administered, then it should be pierced according to the manual technique, so that the patient will pass their urine.

De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	Of the section on fleshly hernia and its cure.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	You know that in the section on this hernia, there is a feared loss of function in the major dispositions; because to me it seems that the dismissal of it and being saved by that which is better.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And I am reminding about the operation on that and the species of the abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I say that the abscess is born in the bodies of those whose genitals are composed and it is made by many causes: either by sharp acute superfluity, which is poured into the genitals, or by percussion.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess follows the color of the body, and it is not found in the pain, and it is a severe abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And also there is a putrid abscess, of which the color is dark, and it does not adhere to it.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	And some swellings are made by inflammation of the arteries, and by inflation of those which have already been perceived as remembered, or by inflation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	Mainly that which is due to inflammation of the arteries is diagnosed by the dispersion of the abscess when you press on it with your fingers; and do not touch that which is putrid.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	Mainly that which is made by inflammation of a vein is not dispersed from it for any reason except compression with the fingers.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that on this species a section is made and on the other parts; and it is that you cut the tendon of the genitals, and then stretch the skin to the divided parts, and extract that from the white cartilage, and release the suspensor of the vessels, and tie them, and cut the suspensor so that you release that entire part of the parts of the skin.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Then if the skin is already consolidated in those fleshy parts, then it is advisable that you extract the skin and cut it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is adhesion between any part of the cartilage, or between that which is between the vessels, then it is advisable that you release the entire adhesion and cut it with a round incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	Mainly if there is a growth of flesh in the place of the adhesion which is behind, then it is advisable that you cut all that is of it, and extract the skin as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with wool soaked in rose oil and vinegar; and then take care to treat that with another treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter 64.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	On the treatment of hernia that is of the groin.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	A hernia is an abscess enclosed by some wrapping resembling a tumor with softening of the testicles, and it makes difficult movement and walking for the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the treatment of this illness is to be feared because of that which is preceded by inflammation.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, I will say what operation to perform on it, as the first ones did.

And I say that you should make the patient sit on an elevated chair; and then press the suspender of the testicles to the divided thighs; and then tie the string of the genitals with threads or laces to the buttocks which are next to the penis; and hold those other ministers that you have, and stretch those with a vehement extension.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And then make an incision in the spatula with a sharp knife by cross-section on the right of the buttocks until the buttocks are uncovered.
