And then cut those in the middle place for section of bad and fetid humidity, and extract that which is aggregated from the foul and corrupted moistures.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then heal the wound with care of the other wounds in which you want to be regenerated so that the veins fall, which not being one of the two genitals, is not bad for that.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if the veins occur to all the lower parts, then it is necessary that the testicles be extracted or that the testicles for this reason be tied to the veins, so that they are deprived of all nourishment by the cutting of the veins, and that they be cauterized, or that they be tied so that they are not joined with those.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is by section that creates an end to the cyphac extending over the belly from the part of the angles of the miracle of the belly, so that saying the intestines of that rupture go to some of the intestines.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is of the spleen or of excess of it, and these two species are caused by many reasons: either by percussion, or by salt, or by shouting, or by elevation of some serious cause, or by resemblance.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	In the case of this, when it is due to extension of the spleen, it happens little by little over a long time, and does not happen suddenly, and it is an abscess that forms between the diaphragm and the stomach so that the spleen compresses the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the symptom of it is when it is due to inflammation of the spleen, because at the beginning it makes a vehement pain happen suddenly; and it is a diverse abscess appearing under the ribcage, appearing externally, and this is due to obstruction of the intestine, and the body of it is divided into parts above the spleen.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes it happens that the net of the intestine is pushed out through a hole in the abdomen, and this is called an intestinal hernia, or sliding.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is made in the stomach area, and sometimes it runs into the intestine and gets stuck, and this is a great danger to the patient, and sometimes it causes bad and severe pain especially when it is pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the cure of the species of this disease, iron is feared, because it is believed that the evacuation should be avoided.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the manner of the operation of that is to command the patient to return the intestine with their hand to the internal parts of its cavity, if they obey its return, and place themselves bent over their own neck between their thighs, and lift their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then stitch the cord which is the cord of the testicles to the parts above, and cut the cord of the testicles all along the length; and put in two lips of the section oil according to what was indicated to heal the section with those.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the section, according to the quantity that is possible for you, from which the hole was made outside.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then excavate that which surrounds the cords of the testicles, until the white hard knot of each part is uncovered.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then insert your finger into that which is the testicle, in that which is between the white knot, which is where the cord of the hole is, and between the knot, and resolve the adherence that is in the part behind the hole.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then take the left hand to the scrotum of the testicles to the sides of the behind, and with the right hand extend the white cloth under the left hand, and lift the humidity to the cloth at the part of the section; and command the minister to extend the humidity in this way and you dissolve the adherence that is behind with a complicated solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And be certain with the fingers that there is no cause for the intestine being enveloped in the white cloth during the procedure.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause in them, then press that to the belly of the patient.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle with which is made a thick thread of six threads, and insert it beneath the behind of the cloth, which is under the scrotum of the testicles, which is the section; and then sew the extremities which come out of the thread so that they are four threads, and then compose some of them over some figure in the shape of a cross; and tie this to the cloth which we have said is behind the scrotum with a strong bond of two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the ends of the threads and tie them with a vigorous bond so that some of the vessels which are irritated do not pour out and cannot transmit any cause for which from here does not follow an aposteme or a severe inflammation.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And stop the other vein that ties according to the first tie, three fingers from the navel; and take these two ties and place them under the navel of the hip, where the cod is placed on the testicles in the quantity of their size, and cut all the remaining part roundly, and remove it from the hole.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	Then cut in the area where the cord of the testicles is, for a section through which blood and urine flow, as we have recommended in what we have said previously.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And administer the flaxseed oil as an enema, and apply it to the wound; and administer the tie that we have recommended (and some veins of the white hip are cauterized, which we have said regarding the incision of the vein with a flow of blood, because many veins are cut) and remove the tie so that the blood flows.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the falling of the blood is delayed, then let hot water be applied as a poultice, and put it on that place where the blood flows, as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And cure the wound with the other cures of wounds so that it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66.
De hernia ventosa.	Of bloated hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, nothing is seen that has been cauterized under the treatment of iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first ones said that it is made thus as we have recommended in the hernia that is with the vein; which is that you lift the vessels and place the section above the ease of the patient; and you dry in the middle location around the apostema with that which helps, until the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the distortion that is made in the ankles.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Some swellings show a rupture in the ankles as we have said, and cause pain in the area.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And they do not say to the knees any cause of the intestines to the knees; and if they do, it is little; and it returns in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged with this, there is adjusted a fissure in the hip until the intestine descends into the hip; and it happens that through the extension of the hip, which is in the ankles as we have said, causing the hip to be stretched, and placed is made soft and the area becomes inflamed and hurts.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	The cure of it is with a cautery thus that it is preceded by the narration of it.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And some times it is cured with iron following this method: and it is that the patient lies on their back between their two hands, and then dry the area of the rupture of the abscesses with a scalpel for the width according to the quantity of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white hip that is under the kidney until it becomes uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the bladder and place it on the prominent area of the hip, and press it against the pressure of the belly.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent areas on the extremity of the bladder of the hip, and adjust with a suture one to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the extremity of the bladder, and do not insert it into the hip at all, nor does it extend to the groin, nor any other cause thus that you will know in the cure of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then cure that one with the treatment of wounds, and as you insert the threads, clean that one and restore the wound until it is consolidated; because the hip is contracted and the prominence of the rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And a cautery is better in this place, because it is more beneficial for health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter 68.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the skin of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	When the skin of the testicles is touched in some men it becomes soft due to excess moisture, because the flesh that is between it becomes softened, and its preservation is damaged.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	It is necessary for the one who is preparing the cure of it to make the patient lie on their back, and to lift the entire skin which has been softened above the natural skin; and then to adjust the two lips to the suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, cut in the beginning the excess of the softened skin with three stitches or four and with a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then cut between the sutures; and then cure by curing the other wounds until it is healed and the fevers subside.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter 69.
De castracio.	On castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is forbidden, but for a reason it is legitimate for me to remind you of it in this book; and the reminder of it is not necessary except for two manners, of which one is that in the science of medicine when one is skilled in it, knows the cure of it to whom it happens; and the other manner is that we often have need of castration of other animals for our young, such as of many kids, and of oxen, and of pigs, and of similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And thus I say that cauterization is done in two ways: either by friction or by incision to section.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	More in that which is done by friction, the way of the operation is that we make the beast soak in hot water until the genitals of it become softened and loosened and hang.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those with your hand so that they are resolved and do not appear, removing the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	More in cauterization done by incision and section, it is necessary that you hold the beast and press the cord of the testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then tie the suspender, and make an incision above each testicle with one cut so that two testicles are separated.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then cut those parts that you want to remove from each.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave on those of the scrotum any cause, but the thin scrotum which is above the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this way of cauterization is better than that which is done by friction, because friction strongly leaves some cause of the testicles for which the beast desires to copulate.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then cure the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter twenty.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the cure of hermaphrodism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is seen in two manners: one is when it appears that there is a space in the scrotum of testicles, in which case there is a female figure between two testicles, for whom there are hairs.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And some times urine comes out of that hole which is in the scrotum of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	But in women it's a species: and it is that the womb of the woman on the perineum is similar to two testicles of a man, a little all joined together at the division of the vagina, like the penis of a man with two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the cure is of three species: of two in men and of one species in women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that you should remove those adjusted flesh growths so that the swelling of that thing subsides, and then you will cure them with the treatment of other plagues.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second species of men, from which urine comes out, which is in the scrotum of the testicles, there is neither cure nor operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter twenty-one.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	On protruding lips and flesh due to causes in women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	The ligature is strongly adjusted over natural causes within which it is tightened and made to hold the bandage; and some women are magnified in some ways so much that they spread like men and appear in the streets.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then remove the excess of ligature from your hand or with a knife and scissors.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not cut too much, especially on the edge of the reason, so that no flow of blood is hindered.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then heal that wound with the cure of the wounds within which it will be healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Bad flesh is flesh that is born in the horror of the mother within which it fills, and strongly it is ejected to the partitions of blood according to the likeness of a hernia (and for this reason some first call it "fallen illness"); therefore remove that we cut thus as we cut ligatures, and heal it within which it will be healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter 22.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the cure of gout.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Gout is when the joint of the woman is not perforated, or the hole is small.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it is either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is due to illness which has preceded it, and that is made by flesh not adjusted or by a subtle or thick spleen.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It is made in the prison of the womb, or in the costs of it, or in the upper part of the pus, or in the lower part of the pus, and forbidden from coition and from pregnancy and from childbirth, and strengthen the forbidden menses.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the recognition of that is made by examination of the matrix, if the obstruction is apparent, it is proclaimed; but if it is not apparent, then search for that with the fingers or at the area.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to a subtle sphincter, and it is proclaimed to the dual lips, then touch and disrupt that.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And it is that you apply to the dual lip folds, and immediately after that, touch the fingers indicating both hands under the affected areas.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman should be on her back, the thighs extended, and immediately after that, extend the dual lips outward so that the subtle sphincter is broken and the obstruction is opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	And then take a flannel and anoint it with oil and apply that to the area, and hold it there all day so that the area does not become consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the sphincter is thick and dense, then it is necessary that you cut that with a broad spatula or with a mortar's spoon.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	More often if the obstruction is due to flesh, then suspend that limb with a bandage, and cut into that.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And you put on them the medicines that make stop the flow of blood with emollients, such as aloe, dragon's blood, and juniper, mixed with the white of an egg.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	Then administer a lead pipe widely so that the wound is not consolidated lightly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And hold that for several days and administer massage with dry licorice.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	Then it should be cured with another cure of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And some times they occur in the native birthplace of other flesh, and then it is necessary to cut following this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is due to cancerous aposteme, for the cancerous aposteme which is in the matrix let there not be done counter-irritation with iron in any manner.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter 123.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the cure of hemorrhoids and of tail and of red botch that occurs in the cleft of women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are the appreciation of the orifices of many veins inside which there runs much continuous blood; and as they are antiquated hemorrhoids, thus they are made.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And I have said in the division of the species of those and their signs, and to say which ones receive treatment and which ones do not receive treatment.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore, I say that the intestines and liver when are in the grip of the matrix and do not appear to feeling, then in those cases treatment should not be made with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	More of those which are in the orifice of the matrix, above which feeling is detected, are those that are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is good that you put the woman in a cold wrap and then extend the thigh to the orifices, or with a rough cloth, and incise those at the roots.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then powder over those wounds with the flow of blood from one of the incised powders that cause mordication, thus as cassia and similar to those.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then immerse the feet in a water for an hour, and then soak that in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the flow of blood persists, then make that plaster with decoction of sumach and with powders of millet and of walnuts and of similar things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour of orris root and mix it with honey and wine, and make a plaster to apply on the back of the patient.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	If the blood is separated, it is good; and if not, make an adherence with two bandages, and to the breasts scars will be made.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take wool and soak it in the juice of colicander or the juice of arnagloza or the juice of guarravier with five pennies, and make an adherence to the area; and then heal the area with a plaster until it is healthy.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	More than that, I ask you to be careful with what has been written, because you know how to discern what is pertinent to that which has been said in the aforementioned treatment.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And heal it until it is healthy.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter 74.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the accidental perforation of the intestine in the matrix.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Various species of apostems that occur in the matrix, such as cancer and apostemic plague, and ulcers, and indurated and eroded tumors, and fistulas, and hemorrhoids, and ragadias, and thyl, and other apostems.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already spoken of these illnesses and the species of those, and the signs of those, and the cures for them in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And it is known that I have said in this treatise of apostems that the cautery which is made on the matrix when there are apostems that collect pus, and if you want to know in what manner the operation with iron is done.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	When considering if the pain of the abscess in the beginning is sharp with percussion and fever, and sometimes that swelling and if it falls on the sentiment, then do not think about perforation, and cure it with what helps with the maturation until the intensity of the accidents decreases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then make the woman lie on a chair that has two chairs; and recline on her back with her feet adjusted to the separation of the belly, and her thighs spread, and place her arms under her shoulders, and tie each one with a ligature to what is conveniently available.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the midwife takes the right hand and administers the instrument with which the opening of the womb of the mother is made, the shape of which will be described in those cases that will be done afterwards.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And then when you want to administer this instrument, make it touch the womb of the mother of the woman, and what of the instrument enters into the womb should not be more than the womb of the mother and lead to the illness.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the womb of the mother, then make sure to place pads on the texture of the womb of the mother so that the entrance of any instrument into the womb of the mother is prohibited.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And it is necessary that you stop the flow that runs in the instrument of the side, from above, and that the assistant holds the instrument and rotates the flow until the opening of the matrix is opened.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	When the tumor appears, and it is touched by the hand and it is soft and tender, then it is necessary that you cut that which is above the head of the abscess with a spatula.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the blood is evacuated, then it is necessary that you apply to the wound a gauze soaked in rose oil or green oil in which there is some astringency; and press the calculus into the section in the navel of the matrix.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And put on the matrix and on the perineum a clean cloth soaked in water in which mallows have been boiled.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then it will be cured in two days, provided that one is applied to what is convenient until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And some times the matrix and the wound are washed with water and honey, and then with water in which root of iris or aristolochia is boiled, and then the plaster is reapplied.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is deeply entrenched in the matrix, then it is necessary that you desist from the treatment of it with iron, instead treat it with what we have said in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter 75.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To instruct midwives in what manner the unnatural embryos are to be treated medically when they are seen according to a non-natural figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	A necessary cause is that the midwife recognizes in the beginning the figure of the natural birth by signs of it, and it is that when you see the woman express at the times of labor and desire to smell the air, and about this she is relieved by that which is on her from the part, and examines the essence of the embryo, then know that this part is according to the natural figure, and its essence is above or suspended from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Then when you see these signs, then it is necessary that the belly of the woman be compressed so that the embryo moves down slightly, because when they are above on the navel, they move to the vulva, and it is cleaned of those superfluous things for a good cleansing.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	More often it is that this part is unnatural and not praise-worthy, because when the embryo is situated on its feet and the body of the woman is situated in front of her head and her feet, or one hand of hers, or at her foot, or it is situated with her head and her hand, or at her belly, and for a long time it is turned on its navel, and appears as one of the unnatural figures.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	The doctor needs a necessary cause to be wise and subtle in all those cases, and to guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And thus showing the entire figure of those things, and what engine or device is in those things so that it is signified by them and is established upon them.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the fetus is situated above the womb by natural increase, and it is vehement on the woman and is made in the difficult part, and times the virtue of the already debilitated womb, then make that which women have, and evaporate the congealed humor with a warm decoction and with humid oils.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then the midwife inserts her hand between the woman's thighs, a small spatula, and makes an incision in that second [membrane], or dries it with her fingernail, removing from it what is in it of humidity.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press the woman's belly so that the fetus descends.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then it is necessary that the woman be anointed with a plaster of pitch and a decoction of figs with cypress.

And then command her, and anoint her, to be compressed and make her vomit with a concoction; and tie her mouth and her nose for one hour, so that the fetus will be forced out as soon as possible.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two hands of the feet are swollen at the beginning, then it is advisable that you reduce them with facility little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	More if it does not obey the treatment, then place the woman on a chair and lift her feet up, and hold the chair firmly to the ground; and let the woman be held so she does not fall during the concussion.

And if the hands are not skillfully turned and the foot dies, then incise those and extract the morbid matter from the foot or bind the body to the hand of the one with a cloth and extract that one equally, because that will be swollen.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Of swelling of the embryo on the two feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit. E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not swollen with what we have recommended, then you return the foot little by little until it takes its natural shape, because then it will be swollen with less swelling.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is forbidden to use all that we have recommended, then take a mixture of high alum and dissolved gum, and strike it thoroughly in the mortar with good percussion, and apply this paste to the wound of the woman, at the bottom of her belly.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And make that mixture into a cold water infusion, until it achieves the hypochondria.

And when you have applied the subfumigation for an hour, then make a poultice on a seat, and apply it to induce vomiting and clear the mouth of them, and lift their legs, and press the separated part at the lower abdomen with gentle compression, so that the fetid humor may be expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Let the foul matter come out over the seat and hands of them.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the foul matter comes out in this manner, then gently and slowly insert their hands little by little; and place the woman's face downwards on the seat, and her feet hanging down, and those should be resting on a ladder, and join their hands.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos. E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the foot is not forgotten, then take the feet of the patient and move them vehemently, and press what is above the hypochondria little by little until the foot reaches the separated parts.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	Then insert your hands and rock the foot little by little, and command the woman to press inside until the foot is forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	A poultice is placed on the foot lengthwise during the time one of their hands is being held.

And command her to massage gently little by little, and when you have done that, then make her sit on a chair and command her to lean on the right side, and command her to be compressed; and make her vomit with a condition.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The prepared fetus exits over the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When you are about to horrifically cut through the mother following this method, consider, and then you insert your nail between the second one so that it is evacuated of humidity.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the child is suspended by the face and neck, then you insert that of the navel, so that it is not retained and dies.

And then insert the child in the divided parts inside so that it rests according to what is necessary, and send the woman to compress certain times, and it will be forgotten with a gentle movement, if God or will.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	The exit of twins or of many fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	It seems that twin births are rarely seen in nature, and some say three or four, but this is strange and uncommon; more so because the cause comes from nature, and it's not a living thing.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And consider those, already being multiple, a second one, and they are separated by the navel, distinguishing those within the ligament in the navel of each of those. Some births are unnatural as if it is a fact from natural movement, and some are also considered unnatural as we have counted previously.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if some of their births are difficult to deliver, and they come to what we have said about unnatural figures, then you will cure them in the same way that we have recounted.

And the midwife should be subtle and do what facilitates and is done with subtlety, and not delay, and be ingenious according to the entire figure as it has been prepared by art leading to health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Recollection of that which is formed in the womb from embryos and are aborted.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some women are formed with one, and two, and three, and four, and five, and six, and seven, and more, and it has been verified by me that a woman aborted nine, and another ten, all of which were fully formed, the cause of which was made by measurement of the glorious sages.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And it is known in the science of midwifery that a strong woman aids in that labor with a similar device, and thus one operates on it as if it were a womb.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter 76.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the extraction of the dead fetus.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat a dead fetus with the method we have mentioned in the division of medicine and it is not forced out, and you are not skilled in using the operation with your hands, then consider if the woman is of good virtue and not at risk of accidents for which loss on her part is feared.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then it is that the woman should be placed on her back on a seat or bed, and her head should be inclined downwards and her thighs elevated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the assistant should hold the two parts of her, or tie her to the seat, so that her body does not move away from the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then anoint the mother's mouth with olive oil and mucus of altaea and of fenugreek and of sesame seed.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife anoints her hand with those oils and mucus, and then inserts her hand with ease into the mother, and then seeks with her hand the place where the fetus is stuck.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And find a convenient place for this: then consider if the foot is prepared to be placed on the head, and then put the ankles in the heels of it, or in the neck, or in the mouth, or in the palate, or leave the beard, or in the furrow of it, or in the proper places of the ribs, or leave the hypochondriums.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	More if the placement is on the feet of it, then in the penis, or in the middle of the ribs.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And take the ankle with the right hand, and hold the curvature of it in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, and insert the hand with ease and put the ankle in some of those places we have mentioned, until you reach the underlying cause.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	Then take and place on the opposite side of it another ankle, or the thigh if necessary, so that it is attracted equally, and not extended according to its natural straightness alone.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And massage the entire affected area, so that its discomfort is alleviated just as it is done in order to eradicate it.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And take in that which is between them that the extension should be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then take that the midwife anoints some of her fingers with oil and inserts them gently and stirs with those fingers the retained area.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the foot is dislocated, then the ankles are loosened and placed in the area where it should be; and do so until the entire foot is dislocated.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is displaced outward from the other, and it's not possible to reduce it by constraining it, then take a cloth that has been wrapped around it; and carefully extract it until it's entirely dislocated, and reset it either in the joint of the hand or in the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do the same on the other hand and on both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the foot is large, or is constricted in the swelling, or is in the head of the water being adjusted, then take a spatula and insert it between the tendons and split the head and extract the water, or that it be scraped with an instrument which is called “alundat”, the shape of which will be described along with the shapes of other instruments in the chapter which is relevant to this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly do if the foot has a large head by nature: then take and reset it with a chisel, or that it be scraped with an alundat as we have said; and carefully extract the bones with the forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is elevated and constricted by the pillow, then it should be cut out so that the humidity which is in the chest is evacuated.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	More or less, if it's not complicated, nor an obstruction to elevation, then you will incline the head as much as is possible to you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the abdomen is swollen with an abscess or it is dropsical, then it is necessary that you perforate that area so that the humidity which is in it can flow out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	More or less, if the fetor is above the two feet, then the attraction of it is lighter and the direction of it to the mouth of the matrix is lighter.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	More or less, if it is constricted by the abdomen and chest, then it is necessary that you extract that which you have wrapped with a cloth over your hand, and that you cut the abdomen and chest so that what is in them can flow out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	More or less, if the other members are stopped and the head is turned, then the left hand enters; more or less, if the mouth of the matrix is opened, then the hand enters the womb, and near that, the head is turned, and it attracts that with the fingers into the mouth of the matrix, and places one or two fingers inside, and pulls it towards those.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the womb is constricted by an apostemal cautery which adheres to it, then beware that it does not cause turmoil within it; however, beware then to administer an infusion of humid and fatty substances.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	Then administer plasters; and follow the patient with waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the pain is on the side of the liver, then if possible, it should be pricked: and there should be administered what we have said for the painful liver.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then let it be cut into pieces, and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And beware that you do not leave any cause of pain within the second intestine.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operation, then administer what we have said about the cure of apostems, those that adhere to the womb.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there is an adherence of bloody flux, then dip in astringent waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose womb the fetus was dead, and then upon that place another conceived fetus, and then the dead fetus is another matter.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It adheres to the navel for a long time an apostem; and it is inflated between the womb and the intestines, and begins to throw out arms.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And you were called to treat him, and you treated him for a long time, but the wound is not consolidated.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then you applied to him from some causes a plaster of strong attraction, and extracted from him a bone, and then passed the urine, and extracted another bone; and you were very marvelled, since there is no bone in the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then you thought that they were bones of a dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then you probed the wound, and extracted from it many bones, the woman existing in her seventh month of pregnancy, and already had been in such a manner for a long time, and delivered from it a small arm.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And you do not find it strange, but rather that in this there is knowledge and help for that which the doctor's skillful hand administers for the cure.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of a vertex with which the mother is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a holder in which the limbs are held, to whose holding belong two vertices at the two extremities of two fetuses.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	It is recommended that this vertex be made more subtle by the craftsman, and that it be made of ivory or of boxwood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each thigh is two fingers and the margin of each thigh is one finger, and the length of each thigh is one and a half palms; and in the middle location of two thighs there are two adjustments of that same thigh, which are already firm, of which the length is a little more than half a palm, and the width of each thigh is two fingers or a little less.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two additions should be introduced into the mouth of the matrix so that it opens with those when you apply the two prescribed virtues.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Make another similar to that one, but more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Let it be made from the fibers of elder or boxwood, according to the resemblance of strengths.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	More often on the extremity of it put two additions thus times, and the length of these additions is about one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the matrix, then make the woman sit on a chair with her feet hanging, opening what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then take your hand with the instrument thus as you make a hole according to the quantity that you want of the width of the mouth of the matrix, until the thread makes what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of dizziness that the ancients described:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of swelling on which the foot is swollen:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of friendship on which the big head is constricted
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is assembled with forceps to which the teeth are in the extremity, like times, and some visits are made long like forceps according to this form, like times, to which the teeth are like teeth of reassurance on which it has fallen and is constricted.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of little or weak friendship:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of a wound having a spine or splinter:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of a wound having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps on which the teeth of the shoe are, on which the head of the foot is constricted:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a spatula having two extremities on which the head is separated or cut off:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two broad or wide spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and the more the species of that one are multiplied and prepared by the artisans, the easier it is to its operation and the more useful it is for men because of their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not neglect those instruments, for they should be prepared by you, because the need for them is inexcusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second [or possibly "the afterbirth" or "placenta"], however considering
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the afterbirth is retained from the birth, then it is necessary that you command the ill woman to retain her seat, and make her vomit with a concoction, and hold your hand over her mouth and over her nostrils, and if by this way she is not discharged, it is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then take a woolen cloth and perforate in the blanket a hole and put in that opened mouth of the mother, thus with warmth and rough and nettle and chamomile and dried Arabic and Cassia wood and holy tree.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	Soak all these herbs or some of them in water in the cloth, and put that on the womb.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	Then put a tube of cane in the mouth of the mother, and hold it until the vapor comes to the cavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And make her vomit in the way we have said, and the afterbirth will be expelled with speed.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this cure is not effective, then you command the midwife to insert her left hand into oil of juniper or in a mixture of nutmeg, and then introduce it into the womb and search for the afterbirth, and when she has found it, then take it out little by little. But if it is attached to the womb of the mother, then introduce the hand as we have recommended, and when she has found the afterbirth, extract it slowly so that the mother does not feel vehement pain.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Let both sides of the costal areas be permeated with gentle ease on the right and left.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust in the amount of traction, so that it will obey and withdraw from adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the matrix is constricted, we have already recommended the cure with purging and medication of the bile with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not forgotten with all the causes that we have recommended, then beware that you do not make an iteration of abstraction on that, but rather it is necessary that what comes out of it from the mouth of the matrix to the thigh of the woman, and then apply a plaster and tetra-pharmakon; because that will make her purify for several days and it will be dissolved and forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it is purified, the evil humor is elevated from her to the head and to the stomach, and that oppresses the patient; and then it is necessary that sub-phumigations and conveniences be administered to her.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already used a sub-phumigation of dried nasal snuff and of dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Shape of an instrument with which the woman is fumigated to retain the menses and the secondine ( likely referring to a device used to treat female disorders, such as retention of menstrual flow or afterbirth).
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It must be done with sight or by feeling.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And let the thin extremity be placed in the bowl and the wider extremity over the focus, and the sub-fumigation be placed on the arms of the focus.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And hold that one until the sub-fumigation is consumed and another one is put in its place.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of the treatment of the navel of the unperforated child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born and their navels are not perforated, which have a thin and closed cicatrix.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then tell the midwife to pierce that cicatrix with her finger; and if not, pierce it with a sharp spatulum, and be careful not to touch the liver.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And immediately apply on that place a flannel soaked in wine and oil; and treat it with an ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is closed, then put a cannula in the navel for many days, and remove it when the child is able to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And if there is closure of the navel due to consolidation of a wound or an abscess; then tell that this consolidation should be incised, and immediately treated with what we have said about the treatment and the poultice.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of the treatment of fistulas that appear in the eyes.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that appear in the low part of the eyes are a sign of thickening and nodules, which appear near the anus or in the space of one side.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or many boils.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that nodulation is ancient and corrupted by damp whitish or subtle purulence, and some veins are seen coming from these fistulas, some penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those penetrating are known by the fact that a discharge is issued from them through excretion and flatulence; and some times it happens that the patient has diarrhea, and often the worm is expelled from them.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And some of these fistulas are seen in the space penetrating into the bladder, and into the marrow of the penis; and some of these penetrating go into the joint of the thigh and into the knot of the hip.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And that in which a penetrating fistula is recognized as entering into the anus and not entering, is that you put your finger inside the anus, and you insert a thin probe of iron or wire into the fistula when there is no obstruction.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is an obstruction in it, then insert a thin probe of lead or horsehair into which you feel the probe or the hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel anything in the entire abdomen nor any protrusion of the bowel or any cause of evacuation or worms or gas, as we have said, then know that it is non-penetrating, and then touch the area to be treated.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	When the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the flesh of the penis, then the sign of it is excessive urine from that and prohibition to him from going to the place where medicine will be applied to consolidate it.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	More so if it is penetrating into the joint of the thigh or into the bone and increases pain in the circle, then the signal of it is that the tenderness is felt inside here, if there is not brittleness inside the bone, and increase of pain in the circuit of the affected part; and that of it produces pus and discharge; and that it does not respond to medication, nor is consolidated with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas there is no cure at all, and the treatment of those is labor and vanity of the foolish doctors, on which they are firm.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in the one that is not penetrating and not chronic, healing with iron is hoped for, according to what you have recounted, and that which has already been tried and proved.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient lies between your hands on the back of the bed and lifts their legs inside, the thighs are inclined towards their belly, and then insert a probe of lead, or of iron if it's an anal fistula, until you feel the place where the probe penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if that sensation causes the patient to turn around the neck, then it is necessary that you insert your finger inside the neck.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel with your finger that the probe has already penetrated and uncovered the passage, or if you feel between the finger and the sphincter or flesh, then you are certain that it is penetrating; and therefore do not work on that, because it is not in that place where healing will occur, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	More importantly, I have said to some that certain illnesses are healthy in certain men badly.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And of the medication for which it is hoped that youth is regained in him, it is that you apply subtle cauterization according to the width of the fistula, as previously described, and insert that ignited thing into the fistula until it reaches around the neck; and then repeat this two or three times until you feel that all those adjusted tissues, which resemble a nest of feathers, are adjusted.
